name: kakure Eria - Artist Style
description:
kakure Eria - Artist Style 🎨

This LoRA is trained on the amazing artstyle of kakure Eria , you can checkout their creations on Pixiv or Twitter [may contain explicit content].

This LoRA is trained on color corrected dataset to produce vivid colored results.

This LoRA istrained to do well in both SFW and NSFW Needs

Usage Tips :

  • regular use is at the weight of 1 to 0.7 ,

  • No need for activation word but adding kakureEriaStyleto the prompt will force the image elements toward subjects (NSFW) covered by the artist , and also gives the LoRA a bit more influence.

  • try experimenting with removing quality tags like "masterpiece" or a adding "flat colors" or "desaturated" or "unfinished" explore variations of the style.

Samples settings :

  • Checkpoints: Anyhentai 19, Grapefuit

  • Steps : 24-28

  • Sampler : DPM++ 2M

  • ClipSkip : 2

have fun and consider rating ⭐
